text: Kanti kuSulaym√¢n Senza umoya wamthobela, umtsi wawo wasekuseni wawulingana nohambo lwenyanga (yonke) nomtsi wawo wasemva kwemini ulingana nohambo lwenyanga. Samenza wampompozelwa ngumthombo wekopolo (eyikiyiki) ukanti phakathi kweejinni kwakukho ezo zazimsebenzela ngemvume yeNkosi yakhe. Nabani na oye wanxaxha kumyalelo weThu Siya kumenza angcamle isohlwayo seDangatya (loMlilo)
